name: .XOM File Extension
summary: Learn about .XOM files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A XOM file is used by Worms, a multi-player turn-based game where players control and battle against teams of worms. It contains 3D geometry, textures, colors, and effects, used to show in-game worm, weapon, and map objects.

content: XOM files are used by Worms 3D and Worms 4.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
